name: Eye Color Quad Eyeshadow Palette
about: What it is:A palette of coordinated eyeshadows that comes in a range of finishes designed to create iconic, soft-to-bold TOM FORD eyes..What Else You Need to Know:With this palette, you can achieve multiple looks from a bold, smoky eye, to a sexy slash of color, and everything in between. The four luxurious finishes¬ósheer sparkle, satin, shimmer, and matte¬óare formulated with advanced color processes and offer a spectrum of intensity and effects. Two custom applicators are also included.
ingredients: Shade 1: .Mica, Silica, Zinc Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Kaolin, Maltodextrin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Squalane, Tocopherol, [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Aluminum Powder (Ci 77000), Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Bronze Powder how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use the applicator to apply onto eyes for desired effect..-Pro tip: Select TOM FORD shades can be worn both wet and dry. Just look for the TOM FORD logo imprinted on the powder formula to know if your favorite quad can be applied wet for a bold effect or dry for a soft, sheer finish.

shades.shade_descriptor: midtone copper red, shimmering burnt red with deep red and maroon
cool bronze tones with a midtone pink
shimmering teal and cobalt with beige and black matte hues
shimmering yellow gold and warm rose gold with raspberry and deep chocolate brown matte hues

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color story. I have several TF palettes and I feel like this is unique to my collection. Same amazing quality you would expect with TF.
